name: The Great Escape
paragraphs: You search frantically for a way to escape, but the creatures are everywhere. Just when you start to lose hope, you notice an open window on the far side of the room. It's a long shot, but it might be your only chance.

You gather all your strength and make a run for it, dodging the creatures as best you can. Miraculously, you make it to the window and climb out onto the fire escape. You look back at the hospital, feeling relieved to have escaped with your life. As you walk away from the hospital, you realize that you'll never forget this experience, no matter how hard you try.
